info.title: AFDXManagementClient
info.description: Use these APIs to manage AFDX resources through the Azure Resource Manager. You must make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.

get.description: Lists all of the AFDX profiles within an Azure subscription.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the AFDX profiles within a resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a AFDX profile with the specified profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new AFDX profile with a profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.
Profile properties needed to create a new profile.
parameters.name: profile

201.description: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new profile has been created.

202.description: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing AFDX profile with the specified profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: profileUpdateParameters
parameters.description: Profile properties needed to update an existing profile.

202.description: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an existing AFDX profile with the specified parameters. Deleting a profile will result in the deletion of all of the sub-resources including endpoints, origins and domains.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

202.description: Accepted. The request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: No Content. The request has been accepted but the profile was not found.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an existing AFDX domain with the specified domain name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new domain within the specified profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Domain properties

201.description: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new domain has been created.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing domain within a profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Domain properties

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an existing AFDX domain with the specified domain name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.

204.description: No Content. The request has been accepted but the domain was not found.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: Name of the domain under the profile which is unique globally.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets an existing AFDX endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new AFDX endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Endpoint properties

201.description: Created. The request has been fulfilled and a new endpoint has been created.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing AFDX endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile. Only tags can be updated after creating an endpoint. To update origins, use the Update Origin operation. To update origin groups, use the Update Origin group operation. To update domains, use the Update Custom Domain operation.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: endpointUpdateProperties
parameters.description: Endpoint update properties

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed

delete.description: Deletes an existing AFDX endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: contentFilePaths
parameters.description: The path to the content to be purged. Path can be a full URL, e.g. '/pictures/city.png' which removes a single file, or a directory with a wildcard, e.g. '/pictures/*' which removes all folders and files in the directory.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Name of the AFDX profile which is unique within the resource group.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: contentFilePaths
parameters.description: The path to the content to be loaded. Path should be a full URL, e.g. â€˜/pictures/city.png' which loads a single file

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: deliveryRuleName

parameters.name: profileName

parameters.name: deliveryRuleName

parameters.name: deliveryRuleProperties

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an existing delivery rule within an endpoint.

parameters.name: profileName

parameters.name: endpointName
parameters.description: Name of the endpoint under the profile which is unique globally.

parameters.name: deliveryRuleName

204.description: No Content. The request has been accepted but the origin was not found.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available AFDX REST API operations.

default.description: CDN error response describing why the operation failed.

Profile.description: CDN profile is a logical grouping of endpoints that share the same settings, such as AFDX provider and pricing tier.

sku.description: The pricing tier (defines a AFDX provider, feature list and rate) of the AFDX profile.

ProfileProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create a profile.

ProfileListResult.description: Result of the request to list profiles. It contains a list of profile objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX profiles within a resource group.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of profile objects if there are any.

ProfileUpdateParameters.description: Properties required to update a profile.

AFDCDNEndpoint.description: CDN endpoint is the entity within a AFDX profile containing configuration information such as origin, protocol, content caching and delivery behavior. The AFDX endpoint uses the URL format <endpointname>.azureedge.net.

AFDCDNEndpointProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties required to create an endpoint.

hostName.description: The host name of the endpoint structured as {endpointName}.{DNSZone}, e.g. contoso.azureedge.net

AFDCDNEndpointListResult.description: Result of the request to list endpoints. It contains a list of endpoint objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX endpoints within a profile

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of endpoint objects if there is any.

AFDCDNEndpointUpdateParameters.description: Properties required to create or update an endpoint.

AFDCDNEndpointPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The JSON object containing endpoint update parameters.

originGroup.description: A reference to the origin group.

originPath.description: A directory path on the origin that AFDX can use to retrieve content from, e.g. contoso.cloudapp.net/originpath.

contentTypesToCompress.description: List of content types on which compression applies. The value should be a valid MIME type.

isCompressionEnabled.description: Indicates whether content compression is enabled on AFDX. Default value is false. If compression is enabled, content will be served as compressed if user requests for a compressed version. Content won't be compressed on AFDX when requested content is smaller than 1 byte or larger than 1 MB.

supportedProtocols.description: List of supported protocols for the customer's endpoint.

queryStringCachingBehavior.description: Defines how AFDX caches requests that include query strings. You can ignore any query strings when caching, bypass caching to prevent requests that contain query strings from being cached, or cache every request with a unique URL.

optimizationType.description: Specifies what scenario the customer wants this AFDX endpoint to optimize for, e.g. Download, Media services. With this information, AFDX can apply scenario driven optimization.

probePath.description: Path to a file hosted on the origin which helps accelerate delivery of the dynamic content and calculate the most optimal routes for the AFDX. This is relative to the origin path. This property is only relevant when using a single origin.

geoFilters.description: List of rules defining the user's geo access within a AFDX endpoint. Each geo filter defines an access rule to a specified path or content, e.g. block APAC for path /pictures/

webApplicationFirewallPolicy.description: Defines the Web Application Firewall policy for the endpoint (if applicable)

DeliveryRule.description: A rule that specifies a set of actions and conditions

order.description: The order in which the rules are applied for the endpoint. Possible values {0,1,2,3,â€¦â€¦â€¦}. A rule with a lesser order will be applied before a rule with a greater order. Rule with order 0 is a special rule. It does not require any condition and actions listed in it will always be applied.

conditions.description: A list of conditions that must be matched for the actions to be executed

actions.description: A list of actions that are executed when all the conditions of a rule are satisfied.

DeliveryRuleCondition.description: A condition for the delivery rule.

name.description: The name of the condition for the delivery rule.

DeliveryRuleRemoteAddressCondition.description: Defines the RemoteAddress condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleRequestMethodCondition.description: Defines the RequestMethod condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleQueryStringCondition.description: Defines the QueryString condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRulePostArgsCondition.description: Defines the PostArgs condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleRequestUriCondition.description: Defines the RequestUri condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleRequestHeaderCondition.description: Defines the RequestHeader condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleRequestBodyCondition.description: Defines the RequestBody condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleRequestSchemeCondition.description: Defines the RequestScheme condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleUrlPathCondition.description: Defines the UrlPath condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleUrlFileExtensionCondition.description: Defines the UrlFileExtension condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleUrlFileNameCondition.description: Defines the UrlFileName condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleHttpVersionCondition.description: Defines the HttpVersion condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleCookiesCondition.description: Defines the Cookies condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

DeliveryRuleIsDeviceCondition.description: Defines the IsDevice condition for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the condition.

RemoteAddressMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for RemoteAddress match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: Match values to match against. The operator will apply to each value in here with OR semantics. If any of them match the variable with the given operator this match condition is considered a match.

RequestMethodMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for RequestMethod match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

QueryStringMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for QueryString match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

PostArgsMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for PostArgs match conditions

selector.description: Name of PostArg to be matched

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

RequestUriMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for RequestUri match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

RequestHeaderMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for RequestHeader match conditions

selector.description: Name of Header to be matched

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

RequestBodyMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for RequestBody match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

RequestSchemeMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for RequestScheme match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

UrlPathMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for UrlPath match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

UrlFileExtensionMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for UrlFileExtension match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

UrlFileNameMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for UrlFilename match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

HttpVersionMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for HttpVersion match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

CookiesMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for Cookies match conditions

selector.description: Name of Cookies to be matched

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

IsDeviceMatchConditionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for IsDevice match conditions

negateCondition.description: Describes if this is negate condition or not

matchValues.description: The match value for the condition of the delivery rule

DeliveryRuleAction.description: An action for the delivery rule.

name.description: The name of the action for the delivery rule.

UrlRedirectAction.description: Defines the url redirect action for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the action.

UrlRedirectActionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for the url redirect action.

redirectType.description: The redirect type the rule will use when redirecting traffic.

destinationProtocol.description: Protocol to use for the redirect. The default value is MatchRequest

customPath.description: The full path to redirect. Path cannot be empty and must start with /. Leave empty to use the incoming path as destination path.

customHostname.description: Host to redirect. Leave empty to use the incoming host as the destination host.

customQueryString.description: The set of query strings to be placed in the redirect URL. Setting this value would replace any existing query string; leave empty to preserve the incoming query string. Query string must be in <key>=<value> format. ? and & will be added automatically so do not include them.

customFragment.description: Fragment to add to the redirect URL. Fragment is the part of the URL that comes after #. Do not include the #.

UrlSigningActionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for the Url Signing action.

urlSigningKey.description: Resource reference to the KV secret

algorithm.description: Algorithm to use for URL signing

parameterNameOverride.description: Defines which query string parameters in the url to be considered for expires, key id etc.

ipSubnets.description: Match values to match against. Supports CIDR ranges (both IPv4 and IPv6).

UrlSigningParamIdentifier.description: Defines how to identify a parameter for a specific purpose e.g. expires

paramIndicator.description: Indicates the purpose of the parameter

UrlRewriteAction.description: Defines the url rewrite action for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the action.

UrlRewriteActionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for the url rewrite action.

sourcePattern.description: define a request URI pattern that identifies the type of requests that may be rewritten. If value is blank, all strings are matched.

destination.description: Define the relative URL to which the above requests will be rewritten by.

preserveUnmatchedPath.description: Whether to preserve unmatched path. Default value is true.

DeliveryRuleRequestHeaderAction.description: Defines the request header action for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the action.

DeliveryRuleResponseHeaderAction.description: Defines the response header action for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the action.

HeaderActionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for the request header action.

headerName.description: Name of the header to modify

DeliveryRuleCacheExpirationAction.description: Defines the cache expiration action for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the action.

CacheExpirationActionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for the cache expiration action.

cacheType.description: The level at which the content needs to be cached.

cacheDuration.description: The duration for which the content needs to be cached. Allowed format is [d.]hh:mm:ss

DeliveryRuleCacheKeyQueryStringAction.description: Defines the cache-key query string action for the delivery rule.

parameters.description: Defines the parameters for the action.

CacheKeyQueryStringActionParameters.description: Defines the parameters for the cache-key query string action.

queryParameters.description: query parameters to include or exclude (comma separated).

transform.description: Describes what transforms are applied before matching

GeoFilter.description: Rules defining user's geo access within a AFDX endpoint.

relativePath.description: Relative path applicable to geo filter. (e.g. '/mypictures', '/mypicture/kitty.jpg', and etc.)

action.description: Action of the geo filter, i.e. allow or block access.

countryCodes.description: Two letter country codes defining user country access in a geo filter, e.g. AU, MX, US.

contentPaths.description: The path to the content to be purged. Can describe a file path or a wild card directory.

keyId.description: Defines the customer defined key Id. This id will exist in the incoming request to indicate the key used to form the hash.

keySourceParameters.description: Defines the parameters for using customer key vault for Url Signing Key.

KeyVaultSigningKeyParameters.description: Describes the parameters for using a user's KeyVault for URL Signing Key.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription Id of the user's Key Vault containing the secret

resourceGroupName.description: Resource group of the user's Key Vault containing the secret

vaultName.description: The name of the user's Key Vault containing the secret

secretName.description: The name of secret in Key Vault.

secretVersion.description: The version(GUID) of secret in Key Vault.

contentPaths.description: The path to the content to be loaded. Path should be a relative file URL of the origin.

isVodManifest.description: True if path to the content to be loaded points to a VOD manifest file.

privateLinkResourceId.description: Resource reference to the private link resource

privateLinkLocation.description: The location of the Private Link resource

privateEndpointStatus.description: The Approval status for the connection to the Private Link

privateLinkApprovalMessage.description: A custom message to be included in the approval request to connect to the Private Link

Origin.description: CDN origin is the source of the content being delivered via AFDX. When the edge nodes represented by an endpoint do not have the requested content cached, they attempt to fetch it from one or more of the configured origins.

OriginProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin.

OriginUpdateParameters.description: Origin properties needed for origin update.

OriginUpdatePropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin.

azureOrigin.description: Resource reference to the Azure origin resource

hostName.description: The address of the origin. Domain names, IPv4 addresses, and IPv6 addresses are supported. This should be unique across all origins in a profile.

httpPort.description: The value of the HTTP port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

httpsPort.description: The value of the HTTPS port. Must be between 1 and 65535.

originHostHeader.description: The host header value sent to the origin with each request. If you leave this blank, the request hostname determines this value. Azure AFDX origins, such as Web Apps, Blob Storage, and Cloud Services require this host header value to match the origin hostname by default. This overrides the host header defined at Endpoint

privateLinkConfiguration.description: Configuration required to set up origin using private link

priority.description: Priority of origin in given origin group for load balancing. Higher priorities will not be used for load balancing if any lower priority origin is healthy.Must be between 1 and 5

weight.description: Weight of the origin in given origin group for load balancing. Must be between 1 and 1000

enabled.description: Origin is enabled for load balancing or not

OriginListResult.description: Result of the request to list origins. It contains a list of origin objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX origins within a profile

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of origin objects if there are any.

OriginGroup.description: Origin group comprising of origins is used for load balancing to origins when the content cannot be served from AFDX.

OriginGroupProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin group.

resourceState.description: Resource status of the origin group.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning status of the origin group.

OriginGroupUpdateParameters.description: Origin group properties needed for origin group creation or update.

OriginGroupUpdatePropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the origin group.

healthProbeSettings.description: Health probe settings to the origin that is used to determine the health of the origin.

trafficRestorationTimeToHealedOrNewEndpo.description: Time in minutes to shift the traffic to the endpoint gradually when an unhealthy endpoint comes healthy or a new endpoint is added. Default is 10 mins. This property is currently not supported.

responseBasedOriginErrorDetectionSetting.description: The JSON object that contains the properties to determine origin health using real requests/responses. This property is currently not supported.

enforceCertificateNameCheck.description: Whether to enforce certificate name check on HTTPS requests to all backend pools. No effect on non-HTTPS requests.

sendRecvTimeoutSeconds.description: Send and receive timeout on forwarding request to the backend. When timeout is reached, the request fails and returns.

HealthProbeParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties to send health probes to origin.

probePath.description: The path relative to the origin that is used to determine the health of the origin.

probeRequestType.description: The type of health probe request that is made.

enabled.description: Indicates whether SSL should be enabled for this domain.

probeProtocol.description: Protocol to use for health probe.

probeIntervalInSeconds.description: The number of seconds between health probes.Default is 240sec.

ResponseBasedOriginErrorDetectionParamet.description: The JSON object that contains the properties to determine origin health using real requests/responses.

responseBasedDetectedErrorTypes.description: Type of response errors for real user requests for which origin will be deemed unhealthy

responseBasedFailoverThresholdPercentage.description: The percentage of failed requests in the sample where failover should trigger.

httpErrorRanges.description: The list of Http status code ranges that are considered as server errors for origin and it is marked as unhealthy.

HttpErrorRangeParameters.description: The JSON object that represents the range for http status codes

begin.description: The inclusive start of the http status code range.

end.description: The inclusive end of the http status code range.

OriginGroupListResult.description: Result of the request to list origin groups. It contains a list of origin groups objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX origin groups within a profile

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of origin objects if there are any.

DeliveryRuleListResult.description: Result of the request to list delivery rules. It contains a list of delivery rule objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX delivery rules within an endpoint

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of delivery rule objects if there are any.

Domain.description: Friendly domain name mapping to the endpoint hostname that the customer provides for branding purposes, e.g. www.contoso.com.

DomainProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the domain to create.

hostName.description: The host name of the domain. Must be a domain name.

domainProvisioningSubstate.description: Provisioning substate shows the progress of custom HTTPS enabling/disabling process step by step.

customHttpsProvisioningState.description: Provisioning status of Custom Https of the domain.

customHttpsProvisioningSubstate.description: Provisioning substate shows the progress of custom HTTPS enabling/disabling process step by step.

DomainParameters.description: The domain JSON object required for domain creation or update.

DomainPropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the domain to create.

hostName.description: The host name of the domain. Must be a domain name.

sslEnabled.description: Indicates whether SSL should be enabled for this domain. TODO: Is this required for migration/backward compatibility

ownershipIdentifier.description: Challenge used for DNS TXT record or file based validation

azureDnsZone.description: Resource reference to the Azure DNS zone

domainHttps.description: The configuration specifying how to enable HTTPS for the domain - using AFDX managed certificate or user's own certificate. If not specified, enabling ssl uses AFDX managed certificate by default.

DomainHttpsParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties to secure a domain.

certificateSource.description: Defines the source of the SSL certificate.

minimumTlsVersion.description: TLS protocol version that will be used for Https

CdnManagedHttpsParameters.description: Defines the certificate source parameters using AFDX managed certificate for enabling SSL.

certificateSourceParameters.description: Defines the certificate source parameters using AFDX managed certificate for enabling SSL.

CdnCertificateSourceParameters.description: Defines the parameters for using AFDX managed certificate for securing domain.

initialValidationMethod.description: Type of certificate used. TODO: Do we need the customer to specify or should be automatically try all

UserManagedHttpsParameters.description: Defines the certificate source parameters using user's keyvault certificate for enabling SSL.

certificateSourceParameters.description: Defines the certificate source parameters using user's keyvault certificate for enabling SSL.

KeyVaultCertificateSourceParameters.description: Describes the parameters for using a user's KeyVault certificate for securing domain.

KeyVaultSecret.description: Resource reference to the KV secret

updateRule.description: Describes the action that shall be taken when the certificate is updated in Key Vault.

deleteRule.description: Describes the action that shall be taken when the certificate is removed from Key Vault.

DomainListResult.description: Result of the request to list domains. It contains a list of domain objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX domains within a profile.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of domain objects if there are any.

KeyListResult.description: Result of the request to list keys. It contains a list of key objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX keys within a profile.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of key objects if there are any.

Key.description: Friendly key name mapping to the any key or secret related information.

KeyProperties.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the key to create.

type.description: The type of the key to create.

domainProvisioningSubstate.description: Provisioning substate shows the progress of custom HTTPS enabling/disabling process step by step.

customHttpsProvisioningState.description: Provisioning status of Custom Https of the domain.

customHttpsProvisioningSubstate.description: Provisioning substate shows the progress of custom HTTPS enabling/disabling process step by step.

KeyParameters.description: The domain JSON object required for domain creation or update.

KeyPropertiesParameters.description: The JSON object that contains the properties of the domain to create.

hostName.description: The host name of the domain. Must be a domain name.

sslEnabled.description: Indicates whether SSL should be enabled for this domain. TODO: Is this required for migration/backward compatibility

ownershipIdentifier.description: Challenge used for DNS TXT record or file based validation

azureDnsZone.description: Resource reference to the Azure DNS zone

domainHttps.description: The configuration specifying how to enable HTTPS for the domain - using AFDX managed certificate or user's own certificate. If not specified, enabling ssl uses AFDX managed certificate by default.

type.description: The type of the resource whose name is to be validated.

CheckNameAvailabilityOutput.description: Output of check name availability API.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the name is not available.

message.description: The detailed error message describing why the name is not available.

ValidateProbeInput.description: Input of the validate probe API.

ValidateProbeOutput.description: Output of the validate probe API.

isValid.description: Indicates whether the probe URL is accepted or not.

errorCode.description: Specifies the error code when the probe url is not accepted.

message.description: The detailed error message describing why the probe URL is not accepted.

ResourceUsageListResult.description: Output of check resource usage API.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of domain objects if there are any.

ResourceUsage.description: Output of check resource usage API.

resourceType.description: Resource type for which the usage is provided.

unit.description: Unit of the usage. e.g. Count.

currentValue.description: Actual value of usage on the specified resource type.

limit.description: Quota of the specified resource type.

ResourceType.description: Type of AFDX resource used in CheckNameAvailability.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationsListResult.description: Result of the request to list AFDX operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of AFDX operations supported by the AFDX resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource.

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

QueryStringCachingBehavior.description: Defines how AFDX caches requests that include query strings. You can ignore any query strings when caching, bypass caching to prevent requests that contain query strings from being cached, or cache every request with a unique URL.

AFDCDNEndpointProtocols.description: Supported protocols for the customer's endpoint.

Sku.description: The pricing tier (defines a AFDX provider, feature list and rate) of the AFDX profile.

OptimizationType.description: Specifies what scenario the customer wants this AFDX endpoint to optimize, e.g. Download, Media services. With this information we can apply scenario driven optimization.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates AFDX service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2017-04-02.

resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.
